snippet: Analysts have an intense interest in seeing whether Pyongyang can detonate a uranium bomb instead of the plutonium ones it has tested so far.
abstract: Scientists and officials stress importance of knowing whether North Korea is using uranium or plutonium device in event of its conducting third nuclear test, but add that United States and its allies may have difficulty determining this; uranium detonation would indicate that North Korea is well on its way to expanding its nuclear arsenal.
lead_paragraph: Analysts have an intense interest in seeing whether Pyongyang can detonate a uranium bomb instead of the plutonium ones it has tested so far.

headline.seo: U.S. May Have Troubles Gauging North Korean Nuclear Test
headline.main: U.S. May Have Trouble Gauging North Korean Nuclear Test
headline.print_headline: North Korea: A Third Nuclear Test May Not Answer Basic Questions
